title: Senator Asks Whether Biden Probe Was Linked to China Trade Talks
text:
WASHINGTON—A Democratic senator asked the Trump administration to clarify whether U.S. officials sought to inject an investigation of former Vice President Joe Biden into trade negotiations with Beijing.

Sen. Ron Wyden of Oregon, the top Democrat on the Senate’s trade-focused committee, on Tuesday sent letters to senior administration officials after trade adviser Peter Navarro in a television interview declined to address questions on whether Mr. Biden or his son Hunter Biden have come up in talks with Chinese officials.

...
description: A Democratic senator asked the Trump administration to clarify whether U.S. officials sought to inject an investigation of former Vice President Joe Biden into trade negotiations with Beijing.
